EisConf.Desc: Each of the parameters is expected to be in the form param=value in the config file. each param is on a line, and each line begining with a # is considered as a comment.

Param.Desc: time between each ping sended to the client. Avoid using interval lower than 2 or 3 minutes due to the excess of message generated. time is in ms.
name of the server. Used in diverse message, you should keep it relatively short.
version of the application, this information is displayed to the client in some commands.
bouncer port, the client should use this port in case of bouncing.
Time to wait for the pong after ping before deconnecting the client. value is in ms
Max number of clients accepted by the server. After this, all clients are refused.
Max number of chan on the network. should send error message when no more chan can be created.
How many chan an user can be in.
Port used by the server to listen to clients.
server host to display in IRC commands.
file sended to the client after connection keep it tiny to save bandwidth.
